alert.note: Alert for Inland Sussex; Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Sussex and central Kent Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bowers, or 10 miles southeast of Dover, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dover, Milford, Camden, Bowers, Woodside, Viola, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Rising Sun, Hazlettville, Dover Base Housing, Big Stone Beach, Dover Speedway, Wyoming, Felton, Frederica, Magnolia, Little Creek, Rodney Village, Kent Acres and Riverview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
